name: Prom Night
storyline:
It's the night of your senior prom! You can hardly believe it. After four long years, you're about to graduate. What's more, your date is Laurie Reynolds, a tall blonde on whom you've had a crush for years. You still can't believe you worked up the nerve to ask her out, or that she agreed to come with you. You're bursting with pride as you pull up to the St. Francis hotel in your brand-new BMW Z3 convertible, Laurie at your side. You're ready for the night of your life. 
 
	You goal, as it has been for your entire high school career, is to make it all the way with Laurie. Hopefully, you'll have some fun along the way ...
summary:
Prom Night is a text based adult adventure run by TADS engine. It is not very easy but neither to hard. It contains over 50 roums (!!!), with a lot of objects to take or things to manipulate - more than 10 - not all at all useful. You must be cautious do not get your hands "full". Then you cannot get other things, and you must drop something. 
 
The storyline is easy-going and with very rich erotic scenes. It contains mostly "normal erotic scenes" except a lesbian one. Anal sex is almost out of question. 
 
Note that there are some some bugs eg. I could not take the key from Kate while in hot tub based on my playing or the bill is never (not needed ?) to be paid or I could get undress Debbie, but not willing to procceed to any other actions.
